title: Cybersecurity for Small Businesses
author: John Doe
summary: Essential security practices to protect your business from evolving digital threats.
content:
Security is not just for enterprises. Small businesses are often targets because they lack robust defenses. 2026 demands a zero-trust approach.

## Multi-Factor Everything
Password-only authentication is dead. Passkeys and hardware security keys are now the standard for protecting sensitive business data.

## Regular Audits
Automated security scanners have made it easier than ever to find and patch vulnerabilities before hackers do.
